member.name: VALENTA
member.summary: Contains information about a registry value. The function uses this structure.

member.name: VALENTA.ve_valuename
member.summary: The name of the value to be retrieved. Be sure to set this member before calling.

member.name: VALENTA.ve_valuelen
member.summary: The size of the data pointed to by ve_valueptr, in bytes.

member.name: VALENTA.ve_valueptr
member.summary: A pointer to the data for the value entry. This is a pointer to the value's data returned in the lpValueBuf buffer filled in by.

member.name: VALENTA.ve_type
member.summary: The type of data pointed to by ve_valueptr. For a list of the possible types, seeRegistry Value Types.
